summary: have you ever thought of trying to breathe underwater but you don't have the spell and you're not an argonian, well just kill one and take his water breathing.
descriptionHtml:
in the winking skeever in solitude you will find an argonian wizard sitting peacefully. probably thinking about home, his family, and the shortness of life that would drive one to live it to its fullest. kill him and brutally steal his gills so you can breathe water. 
<br />
<br />also this mod works as intended i will not listen to any constructive criticism, now if you'll excuse me i have half a litre of coffee to inject into my bloodstream. have i mentioned trains yet maybe i should. 
<br />
<br />todd howard if you're reading this [s]the creation club is a failure and you have ruined the fallout series [/s] have a nice day
author: taleofmoe
